active_learning.discussion_prompt: In what scenarios would an Interconnection Security Agreement (ISA) be more critical than a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU), and why? Debate using real-world examples like cloud service interconnections, supply chain partnerships, or critical infrastructure links (e.g., under NERC CIP). Consider factors such as data sensitivity, regulatory compliance, and risk levels.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
